title: God support looking for ADC to climb with.
body:
Add me in game if you are a god ADC. We can climb to Challenger and beyond, trust me.

Currently Silver 4. Would self-appraise skills to be Diamond+. Please, nobody with below-Gold skills. Gold is pushing it too. Looking more for Diamond+ smurfs.

replies.body: Do u even know how to drop down a ward?
Ikr my skill cannot match up with bronze peasant like you.EXCUSE me for dat
